team_props.title: Our Management Team
team_props.comment: All the team members are fully experienced in the govermental field and technology industries.

Ko.title: CEO
Ko.description: Ko is the former deplomat at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan. Prior to establish his own company, Shangri-la Inc., Ko has served 4 years at MOFA headquaters in Tokyo and the Japanese Embassy in China. Ko is also a self-taught full stack developper with over 4 years of professional career in the arena of machine learning and blockchain. Speaks Japanese, Korean, Chinese and English.

Woojin.title: CTO
Woojin.description: Blockchain specialist with more than 10 years of professional experiences in the arena. After dropping out from the faculty of phisics at Hanyang University in Seoul, South Korea, Woojin has started his professional career as a tech specialist with 3 times of ecperiences as CTO in several startups including 2 well known blockchain startups in South Korea.
